Heading: Co-publisher
Note: Use where two or more publishers co-publish the exact same product, either under a single ISBN (in which case both publishers are co-publishers), or under different ISBNs (in which case the publisher of THIS ISBN is the publisher and the publishers of OTHER ISBNs are co-publishers. Note this is different from publication of ‘co-editions’

Heading: Published in association with
Note: Use also for ‘Published in cooperation with’

Heading: New or acquiring publisher
Note: When ownership of a product or title is transferred from one publisher to another

Heading: Publishing group
Note: The group to which a publisher (publishing role 01) belongs: use only if a publisher has been identified with role code 01

Heading: Publisher of facsimile original
Note: The publisher of the edition of which a product is a facsimile

Heading: Repackager of prebound edition
Note: The repackager of a prebound edition that has been assigned its own identifier. (In the US, a ‘prebound edition’ is a book that was previously bound, normally as a paperback, and has been rebound with a library-quality hardcover binding by a supplier other than the original publisher.) Required when the <EditionType> is coded PRB. The original publisher should be named as the ‘publisher’

Heading: Former publisher
Note: When ownership of a product or title is transferred from one publisher to another (complement of code 09)

Heading: Publication funder
Note: Body funding publication fees, if different from the body funding the underlying research. Intended primarily for use with open access publications

Heading: Research funder
Note: Body funding the research on which publication is based, if different from the body funding the publication. Intended primarily for use with open access publications

Heading: Funding body
Note: Body funding research and publication. Intended primarily for use with open access publications

Heading: Printer
Note: Organisation responsible for printing a printed product. Supplied primarily to meet legal deposit requirements, and may apply only to the first impression. The organisation may also be responsible for binding, when a separate binder is not specified

Heading: Binder
Note: Organisation responsible for binding a printed product (where distinct from the printer). Supplied primarily to meet legal deposit requirements, and may apply only to the first impression

Heading: Manufacturer
Note: Organisation primarily responsible for physical manufacture of a product, when neither Printer nor Binder is directly appropriate (for example, with disc or tape products, or digital products on a physical carrier)
